name: Extended Animal Focus
text: You can assume the aspects of an animal for longer stretches of time than most of your rivals and allies.
benefit: Add your Wisdom bonus (minimum 1) to the number of minutes per day that you can use your animal focus ability to assume the aspects of an animal.
text_zh: 你可以长时间地模仿一种动物的特征。
prerequisites_zh: 猎人动物之力职业能力。
benefit_zh: 你可以将你的感知调整值（最少为1）分钟的额外使用时间加到你每日使用动物之力的时间上。
